nodes.text: Dark Jedi robes were the typical wear of Dark Jedi, Force-sensitives aligned with the dark side of the Force. The specific robes worn were broken down into two simple groups: those belonging to and worn by Dark Jedi Knights, and those to and by Masters.

Despite being referred to as "Dark Jedi robes," players could equip their characters with these robes in both games of the Knights of the Old Republic series, regardless of their alignment. The Dark Jedi robes of the first Knights of the Old Republic game resemble Luke Skywalker's black Jedi robe in Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi.
